backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking background-image updates for landing and gratitude pages to specific frontend source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each major frontend file.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_RETRY_NOTES.md: Notes documenting a retry deployment attempt, asset checks, build commands, and expected application behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining a Valentine's-themed OKLCH color palette and dark mode variants with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell containing a root div and script entry for loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component toggling between LandingPage and GratitudePage based on internal state.
Interactive 'No' button that randomly repositions within its container on user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance, updating when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Enhanced Tailwind styles with Valentine's color tokens, gradients, and custom heart animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that sets up providers for React Query and Internet Identity before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GratitudePage.tsx: React page showing a gratitude message with floating heart decorations and a full-page background image. Includes animated icons, themed text, and structured sections for visuals and messages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page asking a love question with Yes and evasive No buttons, using themed heart visuals and a full-page background image. Handles the Yes click via a callback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, and animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries. Defines custom Valentine-themed colors and effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, issues, and features for a Valentine-themed two-page site. Notes background image requirements and current deployment issues.
